MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG3 postcode area of Thornhill, this is also affecting the surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.56am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to on site difficulties locating the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.04pm on Saturday 14th November 2020.
